description: Sasha is a light seafoam green anthropomorphic femboy rabbit with white and gradient muzzle, paws, and eartips. His nose and inner ears are light orange, and he has blond bangs and a yellow tail.  He has large, reflective eyes with dark pupils and two white reflections, gaining lavender irises when surprised. His default outfit is a blue letterman jacket. He's described as lazy, sometimes horny, sometimes sassy, and nice.
